reports_summary: From a single write-up, V Rising runs smoothly on the Steam Deck OLED in the high‑50s FPS when optimised with under‑volting, keeping high textures and visual effects while trimming shadows and volumetrics to hold steady. The build preserves the game's atmosphere and detail, making combat and exploration feel consistent rather than prone to stutters, and the tester relied on FSR Quality to help. Recorded draw sits at about 10 W, which translates to roughly four hours of play per charge in that configuration.
